original_title: 一年ぶりに再会した愛人と1秒たりとも惜しまずヤリたい放題した出張先の休日
overview: Even though I know it's no good, my obedient mistress is too attractive... I've been dating in the past, and I've been in a mistress relationship even after I broke up with 'I wonder'. However, when I got married, there was no place to meet, but miraculously, I was on a business trip to Tokyo where I was. When I contacted him, he rushed to me right away. I hugged her, who was better in looks and erotic than my wife, for a limited time.
title: 一年ぶりに再会した愛人と1秒たりとも惜しまずヤリたい放題した出張先の休日
